lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: My my Clara, how much you've grown! Let grandma have a look at you.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: You think so? I don't think I've grown any taller. Do you like my new dress?

lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: I love it Clara. Now, go on and enjoy the party.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: I will! And I'll show you my new dance moves in a bit, but I must find myself a nice dance partner. See you grandma!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (I'm happy that I was able to see grandma today. I love her very much!)
